mdRecord.dcterms:title: War Time Correspondence to Capt. C. M. Stigleman from L.H. Finch
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time correspondence, May 1, 1862, to Capt. C. M. Stigleman from L. (Lewis) H. Finch Private Co. A 24th Va Regt. Subject: state of the regiment and situation at that time. Also wishes Dr. Stigleman to take care of his family if they get sick. Note: Lewis H. Finch was killed at battle of Druryâ€™s Bluff. This time period was after Capt. Stigleman resigned his commission due to illness and returned to medical practice in Jacksonville. 1 original piece.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
